study_name: Childhood Cancer Data Initiative (CCDI): Pediatric In Vivo Testing Program - Neuroblastoma
study_description: Children with disseminated neuroblastoma have a very high risk of treatment failure and death despite receiving intensified chemotherapy, radiation therapy and immunotherapy. The long-term goal of the Moss√© and Maris translational research programs is to substantively improve neuroblastoma cure rates by developing patient-specific therapies that target the unique oncogenic drivers of each case.
